result.eng: I'll meet you in the café.
result.html: Buailfidh mé leat sa chaiféI'll meet you in the café.
result.ponchtml: Buailfiḋ mé leat sa ċaiféI'll meet you in the café.

result.eng: The café is opposite the library.
result.ga: Tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainne
result.orig: Tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainne
result.html: Tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainneThe café is opposite the library.
result.ponchtml: Tá an caifé ar aġaiḋ na leaḃarlainneThe café is opposite the library.

result.eng: I have breakfast in a café.
result.html: Bíonn bricfeasta agam i gcaiféI have breakfast in a café.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn bricfeasta agam i gcaiféI have breakfast in a café.
